VoiceDir3.11E336: Faking sincerity and concern while gently encouraging the player to help him.
Line3.11E336: I sure hope nothing's happened to it. Help me look around, will you?
Emphasis on ot: :  Faking sincerity and trying to be amicable, encouraging to the player.
Line1.11E336: So, uh... as I was saying, I don't know precisely where it's hidden. But this is the place. So it should be buried around here somewhere.
